line.originaltext: Combine brown sugar, 2/3 cup shortening, water, and 1 teaspoon vanilla in large bowl.
line.annotation: combine({ing193, ing194, ing195, ing196}, ing210, "one", "in a large bowl")

line.originaltext: In another bowl, combine flour, cocoa, salt, and baking soda.
line.annotation: combine({ing198, ing199, ing200, ing201}, ing212, "dry", "mix in another bowl")

line.originaltext: Mix this mixture into creamed mixture until just blended.
line.annotation: combine({ing211, ing212}, ing213, "dough", "mix until just blended")

line.originaltext: Drop rounded tablespoonfuls of dough onto ungreased baking sheet about 2 inches apart.
Drop rounded tablespoonfuls of dough onto ungreased baking sheet about 2 inches apart.
Place cookie sheet in the middle of the oven.
Place cookie sheet in the middle of the oven.
Place cookie sheet in the middle of the oven.
line.annotation: cook(ing214, t20, ing215, "baked cookies", "place in the center of the oven, for 7 to 9 mins or until set")

line.originaltext: Cool for 2 minutes on baking sheet.
Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely.
line.annotation: leave(ing215,"on a wire rack to finish cooling")

line.originaltext: To Make Frosting: Begin by combining evaporated milk, white sugar, 1/4 cup shortening, and egg yolks in medium saucepan.
line.annotation: combine({ing203, ing204, ing205, ing206}, ing216, "frosting base", "stir in a sauce pan over medium heat until thick")

line.originaltext: Stir 1/2 teaspoon vanilla, pecans, and coconut into the warm mixture.
Cool completely, and frost cooled cookies.
